data.name: The Quiet Girl's Guide to Violence
data.detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the https://support.steampowered.com/kb_article.php?ref=8699-OASD-1871">Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

THE QUIET GIRL'S GUIDE TO VIOLENCE (Short):

A victim of childhood bullying decides she will no longer suffer silently in this darkly comic tale of revenge and Christmas.

Directed by: Rafael Antonio Ruiz
Written by: Jennymarie Jemison, T. Lynn Miseska, Rafael Antonio Ruiz

Starring: Jennymarie Jemison, Jeffery Mills, Kelli Bland, Johnny Walter, Byron Brown
data.about_the_game:
THE QUIET GIRL'S GUIDE TO VIOLENCE (Short):

A victim of childhood bullying decides she will no longer suffer silently in this darkly comic tale of revenge and Christmas.

Directed by: Rafael Antonio Ruiz
Written by: Jennymarie Jemison, T. Lynn Miseska, Rafael Antonio Ruiz

Starring: Jennymarie Jemison, Jeffery Mills, Kelli Bland, Johnny Walter, Byron Brown
data.short_description: After Holly encounters her childhood bully, she becomes empowered in her regular life where she quickly takes on other everyday bullies. But revenge is a slippery slope.
data.reviews:
“Magnetically-watchable”
Screen Invasion

“Entertainingly subversive”
Random Walk Through Film

“"Stylishly violent‚ like a graphic novel that pulsatively pops with one instantly-iconic‚ carefully-crafted image after another.”
Smells Like Screen Spirit

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.
